🚨 Crypto.com is supporting @ethereum's Pectra upgrade 🚨

ℹ️ Deposits and withdrawals of tokens on the affected networks in the Crypto.com App and on the Crypto.com Exchange will be temporarily suspended on May 7, 10:05 UTC

✅ Trading of these tokens will not be affected

Please find the list of affected networks below 👇

- ERC-20 (ETH)
- Cronos zkEVM (CRO)
- Arbitrum One and Arbitrum Nova (ARB)
- Base (BASE)
- zkSync Era (ZK)
- Blast (BLAST)
- Optimism (OP)
- Lisk (LSK)
- Scroll (SCR) 
- Starknet (STRK)

Prague/Electra, or Pectra? 🤔

Regardless of your naming preference for the upcoming upgrade, it’s undeniably a key milestone for the Ethereum network. 

Here’s why  🧵👇

What is the Pectra upgrade?

It's Ethereum’s next major hard fork, combining changes from both the execution (Prague) and consensus (Electra) layers. Expect a number of key improvements to Ethereum's ecosystem.

Full details:
https://x.com/cryptocom/status/1919927915367592228
